content.rendered:
Beginning Oct 1, I’ll be hosting Book Club meetings daily, via ZOOM, to discuss my latest release, Don’t Lie To Me: A Journey To Transparency!

All you have to do is take a photo of yourself, and at least 5 other book club members holding up a copy of my book and email it to readytomingle@minglecity.com. The photo can be with the Book Club all together or individually. Just make sure to send them all at once. 

Include three options for dates and times to meet with your book club. Also, include a contact number where the Book Club President can be reached. That’s it! 

My team will reach to confirm a time and outline the format. Please ensure that each member has a quality microphone and good lighting. The meeting will last at least one hour so have your questions ready! I look forward to a passionate discussion and sharing my journey to transparency!

~ Michael Baisden
